activities: Hostopia.com (“Hostopia”) is a bran used by Deluxe Corporation and is part of the Deluxe Small Business Sales Inc. entity. Hostopia is a leading provider of private label web services and business communication tools that allow communication service providers to drive revenue from small businesses, develop new market share, and build customer retention.  Our wholesale clients, or “Partners”, as we call them, are communication service providers including telecommunication carriers, cable companies, directories, Internet Service Providers, domain registrars, and web hosting service providers.  By purchasing our services on a wholesale basis, and reselling under their own brands, our partners enable small and medium sized businesses to establish a web presence, generate leads and increase their sales online.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client data, and customer data, not manually processed by Hostopia.com Inc.
